评论详情: These are a nice pair of yoga pants for a fraction of what you would spend on a big name brand pair. My girlfriend tried them on and the fit was perfect. The material is every bit as nice as the more expensive pair she had that we laid side by side.

I had been looking for some Avia bootcut yoga pants, that's my favorite brand of athletic clothing. I had one pair and wanted more, but I couldn't find that brand in the bootcut style. So, I took a chance on these, and ended up coming back and ordering another pair because I liked them so much! And I'm planning to buy a third pair. The pants themselves are very well made, breathable, lightweight and have just enough stretch to keep me comfortable while working out in them. The look very nice on and fit really well in the waist and legs (I have a smaller waist, but bigger thighs). For reference my waist is 32in, and my hips are 41in. I normally wear a large in clothes (tops and bottoms). They also have pockets!!! The pockets are decent size and I can put my phone, keys, and cards in them when out on a run, or just running errands and not have to worry about carrying a purse. I've washed both pairs I have and they have not shrank at all. They have held up really well. Also, we have pets in the home and it's not too difficult to just brush the pet hair off with your hands. Literally, the only thing I can think to "complain" about is they are too long for me, I'm 5ft. 2in, so, I'm not a tall person. But seriously...for the price and the quality that is really a non-issue. If you're debating, just get one pair and see how you like then. I'm really glad I took the risk and bought them, I might just have a new favorite athletic clothing brand for bottoms!

I love these so much!  The material is great. They can be dressed up or down. Super comfortable and stretchy yet they have the control feeling of keeping everything in place. Nice little flare leg. Definitely recommend these. No shrinkage in the drier. Not super thick or super thin. Pretty much perfect! I wear them to work and I spend half the evening outside. It got down to 21° a few nights ago and I stayed warm. They are breathable, as well. I will most definitely  order several more pairs.  I ordered an XL (I’m 5’8 180  lbs.)
I returned these because the pockets were not on the side but in the front. If I put my phone in them, they gap out. Unflattering!

I usually wear a small but I got a medium in these pants like other reviews suggest. This is definitely necessary. The pants are comfortable and stretchy, but very clingy around the thighs. The crisscross waistband is really cute, but it doesn't stay up. The pants are secure, but the criss cross parts slide down. Pockets are good and big enough for a phone.

评论概述: No tummy control, and see through
评论详情: I love the length since I’m a short 5’2, but the pockets are not made well or thick to fit anything in it. The crotch area bunches in such an unflattering way and it’s completely see through. Not bad for $20 considering the price is fair for all the negatives. No real tummy control. Would buy these again

I ordered 4 at once, based on the reviews and especially the price, knowing I could return them.  I thought I'd wear, wash then wear one pair and if I didn't like them, return the other 3.  I've kept all 4 pairs.  I am 5' 7.5" tall and weigh about 167 lbs and ordered a large.  I like that they are super soft, the length, and the pocket for my sell phone.  I also like the colors - I got black, navy, green and gray.  Keep in mind the fabric is thin and although stretchy, doesn't do tummy control.  I have not noticed any see-through.  It's winter now and I think I'll be happier wearing them in the spring/summer/fall than on these cold days.  But I do really like them and am glad I ordered them.
These pants a great and have a nice fit. They are great for lounging around the house or to run errands. The pants are stylish so you can still look out together and be comfortable.

I bought these for easy putting on for arm surgery.  I bought 1 pair to try they fit perfectly and are flattering, comfortable and medium thickness. Feel great.  I am a 7 in pants 5 ft tall. Usually they are too long. These were absolutely perfect. I love them ordering two more and for less than $15 they are a steal.

评论概述: It is stretchy, I'll give it that.
评论详情: Edit: Now that I've had this for a few months, I'll give an update.  The pros: The pants fit better after losing 10 lbs. Although the material is absolutely stretchy enough to pull up comfortably when I first got it, the waistband stopped rolling down after I lost about 2 inches off my waist. Keep this in mind if you're naturally wide-waisted even when the other measurements fit the size chart. It's made from a slick material that wipes clean fairly easily, which is essential as a mom to a messy toddler. It doesn't have a musty or sweaty smell even after leaving it in a gym bag for a week. The merchant was very kind and offered a refund on these pants after my original review. They're very easy to work with.  The cons: The material has pilled quickly at the seat and I anticipate that the material will thin out quicker than other options. I'm still not a fan of the V in front, I've come to learn that a straight-across waistband fits my body much better, but that's subjective.  Original review below. I was looking for a second pair of black comfy pants and this one was half the price of my first pair. You get what you pay for, I guess. I have a mom tummy and was hoping the criss-cross waistband would comfortably contain the extra skin. It doesn't - the waistband just rolls down and highlights my tummy. The pockets are large enough for my phone, but they're a narrow triangular shape, so anything large and not triangle-shaped will slowly work its way up out of the pocket over time with movement. The material is very stretchy, but it feels quite thin and synthetic. It feels like Halloween spandex, kind of "shiny" and not very breathable. Apart from this, it's relatively comfy.
These pants are such a great value for the money. So comfortable, perfect amount of flare, and sleek pockets on both sides. Very flattering and I’ll be ordering more in different colors.

I got the large size. I'm 5'1" and 170lbs. The material is soft and pretty thick. Not see through, and has solid pockets. The flare is not overly dramatic, closer to straight pants. It's pretty long and I have short legs. I usually fit a 28 inseam length, but this one is more like 30-32 inches.

First of all, I am 5 ft, and knew that the XXL would probably be a little too tall. I will have to hem about 3 inches of fabric. When they arrived I was impressed by the quality (they kinda smell a little bit, but nothing the washing machine can't fix). They are not see through even when I bend all the way over, and the material is nice and soft. I will definitely be wearing 3/4 pairs I bought to Disney World. The only reason I won't be wearing one if the pairs is because of the color.  I thought the Khaki color was super cute, but forgot to take into account that I am WHITE. I am pretty pale, and nowhere near the skin tone of the model in the picture. Luckily I tried that pair on in front of my mom and sister. They told me to NEVER wear that pair in public because it looked like I was NAKED. Granted, they are not leggings, and have that flare on the bottoms, but my sister said that if you couldn't see my feet, you would think I wasn't wearing pants. They would be SUPER CUTE on someone who has darker skin, but they are gonna have to be a pair of PJ pants for me!

Really like these pants more than I thought I would. Very soft  smooth airy  unfortunately a little long but I’m short 5’2.  True to size  I did buy a few more after the 2nd delivery saw they came from China so I regretfully will not be purchasing any more. If they were American made I would.

I had read reviews that said these were thick. They are not. You get what you pay for, I should've paid more for a thicker, better quality pair. There's nothing wrong with them but they are thin and smelled like vinegar.

I've purchased lots of athletic wear over the years, and this by far has been the most comfortable. I'm 5'5, 153lb and got XL. It's a little long(which I expected) and fits lightly through waist/hip/upper thigh. It fans out after that. The pockets are nice and deep. I'll likely purchase more in other colors.

评论概述: Unusual fit but good for the price!
评论详情: I’m usually a size 4 in jeans etc (5’1”/110lb) got a Small. I love how they look but there’s a lot of extra space(?) in the crotch area. Behind fits fine, but the fabric definitely pools around my hips in front. That being said, I guess you could consider them reversible because the front part is the same size as the back LOL  Great for the price, however. And I’m just using them to lounge in, so cosmetic things are a non-issue.  Fabric isn’t as cotton-y as I thought - so would definitely recommend for an affordable yoga pant to exercise in, in a pinch.

I love the blue, I also bought the pink ones.  My only complaint is the length.  I'm 5'10 and 170 and I like my pants to cover my shoes just a bit, these do not.  But they are so comfortable I'm keeping them and I'll just wear them around the house.
I would have kept these but they are too long in the legs and I don’t want to have to hem them. I don’t think the material would hold a sew by hand hem.
It sure would be nice if i ordered brown I get brown not tan
I was looking for a pair of flared pants that were not too wide.  These work well.

These fit great I’m 5’7” 222lbs and they are soft I got xxl the dark blue was actually dark and what I needed. The pockets fit my larger cell phone huge bonus. Have not noticed shrinkage they stayed true to size definitely getting another color. Also held up well crawling with my little one.

评论概述: My Millenial Self Just Loves These
评论详情: These exceeded my expectations! I am short - 5'2, and these actually fit great. With tennis shoes on they don't really drag on the ground. Pleasantly surprised at these and so happy I took a chance and ordered them! I've worn them around the house, for running errands, and at the gym on my lighter workout days. They've been great so far - I've had them for about 6 weeks.
I LOVE these pants. they’re super comfortable and very true to size i’m 4”11 and 125 pounds and a small fit me perfectly. they’re super flattering and not see through at all.

I'm 5'8" 250lbs and ordered XXL. When I pulled them out of the package they looked small, I was hesitant. But they slid on like butter and fit perfectly!! The length is perfect as well. My body frame is a shorter torso longer legs.
I'm not thrilled with these. They are very snug and much longer than I expected. I'm keeping them, but I'm not sure I'd buy them again.

I was looking for some low cost flare leggings to wear around the house and for doing errands, so I figured I would try these. They are exactly what I was looking for. The material is soft and fairly thin but not see through. These aren’t the type of leggings that suck you in and keep things from moving necessarily, but given that I’ll mostly be wearing them with longer tops I’m not too concerned. Overall, I recommend them!
Love these yoga pants! Don’t fall down! Very comfortable to work out in, or just wear around the house! TTS! Perfect stretchiness!
These are buttery soft and not see thru. They are high waisted and hit the waist well and are very flattering and don’t pill between the legs.

评论用户: Perfect size for my bedroom wall table and end table.
评论详情: I purchased the yoga pants for the gym.  I like the fit and they are comfortable. Will purchase again.
I have other leggings in this style. But these are made from stretchy, thin, clinqy material so much it may show panty line. I am keeping but only for Summer with a long hip length top.
I have bought three pairs. I really like the fit the quality of the material and the pockets.

I just reviewed the other pair I bought from a different seller and didn't realize this was the pair with the side pockets.  Okay, so get these. The crossover waistband is comfortable and sits right where it should. It's not Erkel high and it isn't so long that you're constantly tugging at them like they've slid down. I had a c-section and have a bit of a pooch as a result - these are comfortable and don't roll down or anything.  The side pockets will accommodate your phone AND sit right at the point where you can stick your hands in them if you do that (I sometimes do and they're right at the perfect height to do so).  The wide leg bottoms aren't obnoxiously wide and I actually had compliments and one of the attorneys I work with super excited to see wide leg yoga pants. The length is great - long enough for longer legs like mind but not so long that you're tripping over them. They work with everything from flip flops and ballet flats to high heels and heeled boots.  I wish they were a cotton spandex blend, though. These are an athletic fabric. Not a bad thing - I just bought them for work thinking they'd be thicker and keep my legs warm when the office gets a little drafty. I would absolutely get another pair, though, and just wear heavier socks under them to keep my feet and legs warm!
These pants are very comfortable.  The fit is great. I appreciate the pockets on the side. The flare is just right. I would buy again.

After reading the reviews I decided to size up. I'm 5'5" and usually wear a size 4/6 pant. After ordering medium I returned them for a small. The fabric is nice and soft but it doesn't suck in around the waist like most of my other workout leggings do.
They are very well fitted.

I just got these pants and they feel great and look like pants and feel like leggings. I just bought them in another color
These are very comfy and I have not noticed them being see through. They do pile kind of easy

评论概述: The pockets are nice and deep
评论详情: I love these pants and will order more 5 stars

These pants are amazing, I got them in xl just to be safe and they fit perfectly and they have pockets, they are my new favorite pants, and I have been bragging about them since I bought them, would recommend.
Bought these as a gift and she loves them. The fit us good and they are very comfortable.

The product I purchased was titled khaki. It is actually more like pink. My students said I looked like Neapolitan ice cream when it was worn with a brown jacket and a white shirt🤣. The pants are comfortable, but I will have to buy a different brand to get a actual tan version of khaki instead of pink.

评论详情: These pants are very comfortable and the pockets are a good size. They are somewhat on the thinner side though. They do run true to size. I'm 215 and ordered an xl.

I’m usually extra large and I chose a size down probably could’ve gone between the two but I do like the way the large fits love the way that the in the front is very flattering on my middle section makes my butt look good. For reference, I am 5,5 and I weigh 198 and fit in a large  They’re definitely not a cotton field. They have more that spandex kind of a texture to them, but they are very flattering and very comfortable. Love the pockets.
Fit so goood!! Tight in all the right places, will be buying more colors!
I love the quality and price of these pants.
Perfect fit. Perfect length. I am 5’7” 320 pounds and the XXL was perfect for me and my body type. I will definitely purchase again!
I had to return them but they are really nice. Fabric is super soft and loved the pockets. I’m 5’2,90lbs and the xs was baggy in the legs and def too short.

I have a few pairs of similar pants with straight waistbands and they are very comfy in every way except they roll down constantly. The V shaped waist band on these doesn’t roll at all no matter which way I bend, twist, or reach! The fabric is soft, comfy, and not see through. They fit perfectly and true to size. I’m 5’4”, ~175lbs, have 43” hips, short legs, long torso and the large are perfect. Immediately ordered 5 more so I have 3 for work and 3 for casual wear.
wear them every day!
So incredibly comfortable  and true to size fit
Absolutely love these pants and the hot pink color!!  Bought more in different colors!!
I wish you offered in med tall.  Very comfortable
They fit like a glove. They are true to size and I love the waist shape

评论概述: Great Fit and will stretch over your cast!
评论详情: These pants are great for the price! I bought them in almost every color. They stretch is nice and the fit it great. As the picture shows they will go over a cast! My one complaint is that they can snag and pill, but overall great deal!

评论概述: Good quality but tight in thigh area.
评论详情: I would have kept them but for the fit through the thighs - just a bit too snug for me. For reference, I am curvy with wider hips/thighs. I ordered the XL and am 5’7 and 180. I could have worn them but was looking for a slightly different fit.

I have post-zoster neuralgia on my torso and almost any high-waisted pants apply pressure to my belly and cause horrendous discomfort. Not these! These pants are incredibly comfortable. They are a nice weight - not too light, not too heavy. I'm 5'1", 115 lbs, and the size small fit like they were tailor made for me. I just ordered more of them because I anticipate wearing them pretty much everywhere!
Very nice quality for the price and love the cell phone pocket but these were way too long for my 5‘4“ height so I have to return unfortunately

These are just okay. SO juniors from Kohl's were better but they don't make them anymore! I'll keep these but I don't care for the fabric and the top rolls down.  Hopefully they will wash and wear good. Length was fine. I'm 5'6" with longer legs. Just not what I was looking for.
Love these new leggings! They are perfect length for me and I'm five foot. I love the material and love how they have the crossed waist in the front.
They are so comfortable they fit so good I have 3 pairs and I have another pair coming Monday I have 2 more pairs in my shopping cart

My GF looks great in these leggings. She is petite so she has difficulty finding clothes that fit. She is 98 - 100LBS about 5 ft. She likes how they feel and how they are not too long.  She has washed them and hung them to try. Once she wears them and they are not too hot etc she may purchase more in different colors. She bought the dark gray ones.
I’ve worn and wash these a few times now, and they are quickly becoming my favorite yogas! I’m 5’2”, my hips are about 40” around, and the medium is a great fit
These are so soft and comfy. I’ve tried ordering similar ones off SHEIN that seem comfy but then after I while make me itchy. These don’t do that! And they have pockets which is a plus for me!
Very comfortable! I absolutely love them!
I really like these pants. They have a nice fit without being too tight. They are long and not cropped like a lot of current styles. They are also thick enough to not show all your business.
I bought the dark gray pants and a small. I am 56 130 pounds and they fit perfectly size wise and lengthwise. Nice material feels good on your body.

I put these on as soon as I got them and have been wearing them since. They’re cute, aren't too long for me (I’m 5’2” and they’re the perfect length) I wear them slightly high waisted, but if you wear them a bit lower you can probably squeeze an extra few inches out of the inseam. The pockets are my favorite thing ever, and for that reason alone I’ll probably wear these more than my aerie leggings of the same cut.  Also note that these leggings WILL pick up other fibers like dog hair or random lint. A lint roller would help if you use them. I don’t know how they wash yet.  I got a small and I will say they are a tiny bit tight around the thigh for me, I noticed the seam dug into my skin overnight leaving a little imprint. It’s not uncomfortable and I don’t dislike the snugness but I think next time I’ll try a medium.  Overall happy with these!
True to size. Love the look and feel.
These pants are so comfortable. Feels like I'm wearing nothing. True to size. Highly recommend.

评论概述: so comfy from class to errands to home!
评论详情: Super comfy! I am 5'5", about 165, and wear a medium. I wear these so often that they're starting to show signs of wear and tear (the binding seams are starting to come apart a bit), but that's likely just from the sheer amount of use. I wear them around the house, to class, and even to the gym occasionally when it's too cold for shorts. I've come back and ordered these in a couple of colors, and will likely come back for another pair soon as it gets colder out!
I've very happy with these.  They look great and are not too tight or too small.  They are very slimming.

评论概述: A little bit long and ripped
评论详情: I bought these leggings for a costume I was putting together. Pros- They’re a pretty good dupe for the aerie flare cross cross leggings. From what I could tell, they weren’t very see through. (Passed the squat test!) Very comfy! Cons -They were too long for me. I’m 5’4, and I was wearing one inch platform shoes (pic 2). They just barely missed the ground. They would fall down just enough that I was stepping on the end with my heels. (granted i might’ve got the wrong size) - I don’t know if this is the fault of the leggings really, but they do have a small rip in them(pic 1)I think I got a tiny chunk of something stuck to my knee(it felt like a piece of a skittle) and tried to pick it off, but that tore a hole through. It’s a small hole, so i can definitely just patch it up with some thread. This is just something I noticed. The other thing is, I wore them today for the first time and some of the stitching is coming undone (pic 3). It’s in the pocket. I don’t really mind, but again something I noticed. -last con is the way they sit in the crotch area. When pull up all the way, they wrinkle along the sides of the groin. Picture of like this |v|. The crotch is outlined. It’s not a camel toe, but it sort of is? It looks a little better if the legs are pulled down but then the pants are too long.  Tl/dr: I think they’re def worth a purchase if you’re on a budget. The pockets are a decent size and they are very comfy. I would probably buy them again. However, if the aerie cross waist flares are on sale for 30$, I’d spend the difference and just get those. If they aren’t on sale, buy these!
I’m 5’1” and these fit great!! These do collect a lot of fuzz which can get annoying, but other than that they are great!

评论详情: Cute and it does flatten tummy but does nothing for your butt f you don’t have one. I could’ve gone down to an extra small, but this is just fine the way it is. It doesn’t fit you well in the rear end ,doesn’t matter if you go down smaller size. Just doesn’t form the correctly.
I really do love it. I like the fit, and I like the way it feels. It’s just a little short for me.
Pants are comfortable. The fabric is a little slippery when you sit down but they are good for casual yoga pants

Only thing is they’re so long they drag but I’m 5 foot nothing so it’s to be expected once I get a lil hem they will be perfect!

Love my new leggings, they are so comfy and fit great. I’m 5’5 and the length is great but if u are shorter they might be too long.
